website_summaries.verdict: For local transport to and from the vet, this sturdy carrier is a great buy. Rated for small cats; larger cats in the 15 to 20 pound range may also fit this 24-inch carrier, though some users fretted whether the carrying handle would hold up. But you’ll have to purchase a different carrier for airline travel.
pros: 2 access doors, one in front and one on top of the carrier, makes it much easier to shift cats safely in and out
Heavy-duty plastic container keeps pets secure, particularly with the wingnut screws rather than clips
Larger cats above 15 pounds can fit into this bigger 24-inch carrier, and users report the carrying handle holds sturdy even with 20 pound cats
cons: Cat owners needing a hard-sided carrier for airline shipping must look elsewhere, as this product is not rated for air cargo
It also doesn’t include a water cup attachment
The biggest complaint was of missing parts on delivery, followed by numerous reports that the steel front door is either misaligned or doesn’t fit at all
Some users weren’t thrilled about the wingnut screws, which are harder to remove than clips if owners want to disassemble and nest for storage

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a highly portable dog kennel with user-friendly features, this is a good choice.
pros: Sports two convenient doors and a streamlined handle
cons: Good for travel, but not practical if your dog needs a kennel for playtime or extended time in it

customer_reviews.title: Bought New, Recieved Used and Smeared with Feces
customer_reviews.text: The “new” kennel arrived clearly used with dried fecal matter smeared over the inside. As someone who works in the veterinary field, I have seen many dirty carriers in my day. This one was definitely used, pooped in, and returned without cleaning. It was also missing the top handle. Will definitely be returning. Beware if you buy used, they may not be cleaning or inspecting the returned carriers very closely.
customer_reviews.author: Legumes

customer_reviews.title: The top loading and side loading is great. The screw-together format for the top and bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, my cat loves the carrier. The top loading and side loading is great. The screw-together format for the top and bottom keeps the carrier together much better compared to the 'clip' together that other carriers have.
customer_reviews.author: P. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Wrong hardward and missing bolts and nuts!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with my purchase! I received this yesterday in the mail. It appeared at first that all parts where in the packaging .. Well, I began to assemble the carrier and noticed right away that there were 3 bolts and 3 nuts missing and when I tried to put the thing together, the bolts were way too long to which the top and bottom could not be securely fastened!! Just look at the pictures here! Ugggh!! My husband wanted to go the Lowes and get a few things to "make it work" but I said NO! I am packaging this back in the box it came in and sending this back immediately! This was absolutely ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective.  So annoyed
customer_reviews.text: So, it arrived on time and I really needed it today. When I went to assemble it, I only had five screws and seven bolts. Moreover, the screws were too long--like two inches....so even the screws I could put in made it that the door easily falls off. Very poor quality control.....I ordered this over cheaper ones believing that I would get something that would work. Stay away from this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mashehu

customer_reviews.title: Parts were missing!!
customer_reviews.text: I might have liked this carrier IF all of the pieces had arrived!! There was no front door, and no bolts to hold the sides together - only the top and bottom came. And for something this size, it wasn't worth the price to ship back. I was really disappointed with it. I hope that my experience with this product was just a one-time mistake - but I didn't feel right "letting it go" without saying that I didn't get the entire carrier, and was given no option to contact the seller to obtain the parts that were missing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Dana Review
customer_reviews.text: Door goes in groove not pre-drilled holes. Thanks to the other reviews I was aware of this. See photos. Great carrier for the price. Super easy to assemble and arrived quickly. The top door is sturdy and stay closed and secure. Carrier cane with easy directions and extra parts. My cats are 13lbs. and 8lbs. You can fit both in case you gave to evacuate for a hurricane. I order the carrier for 15 lbs. plenty of room and carrier is light weight but not chinchy.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Review

customer_reviews.title: Just opened it up and tried to put together and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it up and tried to put together and the bolts that came with it are way to long. I slide them into the pre-made holes, slide the wing nuts on then completely tighten and there is still at least an inch of bolt showing. It does not even come close to tightening the top and bottom piece together.
customer_reviews.author: D.Kelton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy pet carrier but much smaller overall than the 24 inch kennel. I would suggest going up to the next size if you have an adult cat over 8 lbs., especially if you have a long drive to the vet or they need to be in it for an extended period of time. This is a good size for a kitten or toy size puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: Wtf?
customer_reviews.text: It only came with 5 bolts and wingnuts even though there's 8-10 places for them? One of the wingnuts was defective so that put it down to 4 usable bolts. Also, the wingnuts don't actually tighten all the way so the whole thing partially comes apart when you lift it...and then the front door falls out. I had to use twist ties to secure the damn thing. Good thing my dog is tiny...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Very good carrier
customer_reviews.text: Large (24") carrier -This fits one of my 8 lb cats very comfortably and two 8-10 lb. cats easily. Super easy to put together. The handle was loose in the packing box so make sure to find it before tossing the packing materials. The top load isn't necessary for my cats but it's great for them to see out of during travel. The door latches both seem to be very stable and sturdy. I'm not worried about it popping open. Definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HappyTrees

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with the bolts to connect top and bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the bolts to connect top and bottom, had to use zip ties instead... Not ideal but too large to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive information
customer_reviews.text: I chose the 24" carrier, and today when I got it, I measured the crate bed:, where the animal supposedly will lay down and it was 19" only. I am returning this item because I was deceived by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: I Know It

customer_reviews.title: Kennel top & bottom do not stay together
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with no way to fasten the top to the bottom. There are nine small, square holes around the perimeter of the kennel to attach top to bottom, but no hardware that came with it to keep it attached.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi E

customer_reviews.title: Great looking BUT the top opening is way TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 10 pd cats--this was to replace one of my older carriers---big surprise, the top is only 6" to actually put cat in the top. A herbal or hamster would fit nicely but a 10 pd cat NO way!! Did I try --yep and not 1 of my cats fit in it. My old carrier was the same dimensions but the top was wider , less plastic so they would drop right in nicely. Not fit for any mature cat--10 pds is a average cat so it's a rip off. Save your time and money
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Air holes have razor sharp edges on the inside!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, convenient, light, and easy to put together. BUT the air holes are not smooth on the inside. If you rub your fingers over the insides of the air holes, your fingers will soon feel raw. I bought some 210 sandpaper and smoothed out the air holes. It was a lot of work. They had a razor sharp edges before I did that, worse in the back than the sides, but still all holes needed sanding. Very dangerous for animals that might stick their noses in the air holes (unless you sand the holes first).
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great travel crate for 18lb. dog.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality crate. My 18lb. dog fits perfectly inside and, while in the car, he loves to stick his head out of the top, which opens with easy. When not in use, this crate is pretty easy to break down and store in a smaller size out of the way. EDIT: The photos uploaded sideways, not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *It's a nice sturdy carrier. *I love the fact that they sent extra bolts just in case you accidently strip a plastic piece *And my cats got in it with no problem on their own Cons: *Sharp edges in some of the ventilation holes. Which wasnt a big deal, I understand why a lot of people complained because it could potentially cause a couple owwies. I just took a lighter and melted down the sharp edges. This being the reason why I took a star off. But I'm glad it was a quick and easy fix and that I noticed the edges before our move.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Approved
customer_reviews.text: My pet taxi is for my two adopted baby kittens pictured here at 10 & 8 weeks. As they are small I purchased just one to get started on vaccines and vet visits. Added the bedding for comfort and propped the door open with an extra screw that was included...also added a rubber band to keep it open for them to explore. I read that it is good to get them accustomed to the crate so taking them away in it won’t be as stressful. I am happy with this purchase, easy to assemble, good quality, sturdy, and in new condition without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Carrier
customer_reviews.text: The first crate I received was missing parts so Amazon made me send the whole thing back instead of just sending me the missing parts. It was very inconvenient and is the reason I'm knocking off a star. I and my cat love this carrier :) It is well made and easy to put together and carry him around. It is very secure and fits him well. He is ~20 pounds and very long. He loves to sleep in it during the day. I love the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy crate, but came with no hardware for assembly
customer_reviews.text: The actual crate is great....but there was not any hardware to put it together. I have never bought a crate where I had to go find the hardware to put it all together. I also thought the way it latched would work better, but it can stick a bit making it trickier to open. Crate only can be opened from one side as well: can't switch as most allow (probably due to the way it opens and closes). I would have given it a higher rating if I could have actually put it together. Instead I had to call around to find the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Similar to (and better than) the one the SPCA loaned us to bring our Rescue cat home
customer_reviews.text: Has 5 bolts on each side to secure top to bottom (and some on the front & rear) so is very secure. The adoption manager said the ones secured with clips have opened in transit from their building to the car and they have had to chase animals that fell and are scared from the experience. You REALLY want the security of this model. The doors on top and side are convenient for placing reluctant pets into the enclosure. There is lots of room to place the small pet bed and the large Cat, and the top handle is good to run the seat belt thru to secure it in the car. We definitely recommend this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Safe and a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews warning against sharp edges and the potential for pet injury, I was determined to carefully examine this carrier before letting my pet use it. I'm pleased to say I found the edges around all the windows in the plastic to be reasonably smooth with no sharp edges. I suppose if a pet were allowed to chew on the edges they could hurt themselves over time, but that's true of any carrier. I found the carrier to be nice and sturdy, easy to assemble, and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for rats!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is the perfect size for my three male rats to nap in during cage cleanings and car rides. It's quick and easy to put together, it came with some extra parts, my ratties don't chew this material, and we love the top loading option! My only complaint is the Pearl White color is paired with a really dark brown base instead of black like I thought but that's my fault for not paying attention lol.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy to assemble. For those complaining that the holes are wrong or yours was manufactured incorrectly, you're putting the door hinge in the wrong holes! Look closely at the pictures here and in the setup instructions, you insert the door bars where those ridges are, NOT the little holes closer to the center. (Hard to describe through text, hopefully this is comprehensible!) I do worry a bit about the top door giving way when I carry my tubby kitty around, but maybe I'm paranoid. It's much easier to get my reluctant kitty in through the top door than trying to shove him in the front, though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space for a large cat
customer_reviews.text: My cats are quite large but there was still plenty of space in there for them. I must say I like carrying these way better than my other carriers that I paid 3x as much for. This handle is solid plastic which turns out to be much more comfortable than a wire handle coated with rubber that falls off. Assembly is very tedious but price was worth it. They give you lots of extra hardware. I would have preferred larger holes and better visibility on all sides. It's harder to see in there than my other ones. But during cold midwest winters I'm sure the cats appreciated the better wind protection.
customer_reviews.author: Irate Retro

customer_reviews.title: Some speed bumps in shipping, but great carrier! *Updated*
customer_reviews.text: It got here today. I love it. But I didn't receive any nuts and bolts to attach the top and bottom pieces. So I am exchanging. 1 star, as this seems to be a pretty common occurrence with this product according to other reviewers. If my exchange comes through 100% I'll update my opinion accordingly. Update: my exchange came through very quickly! Amazon sent me a whole new kennel with all the necessary pieces to put it together. We've used it several times now. It's a great carrier; very sturdy and lots of space to accommodate my 12lb fur baby. Love the top door; makes trips to the vet and the groomer quick and easy for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier for small pets!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely carrier! Love the top load and the size is easy to carry. It is SMALL though, so make sure you double check the measurements. I can fit a couple older kittens inside, one medium-sized cat, or five 10-month old kittens--but they were cozy! I like how the screws were easy to use and installation was simple. The pics show a 4-month-old tabby, a 9-month-old tuxedo and the time I filled it with five 10 week olds.
customer_reviews.author: MyBestFriendisaPitbull

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality. This pet carrier fell off a shelf in my garage from less than six feet. Looks like it hit on a corner and cracked clear through in several directions. The main crack is twelve inches long. Either the plastic is too thin or the plastic is too brittle. Now the side door won't stay on. Also the instructions are poor. The side door actually has two door hanging options depending on the model you ordered. No mention of this in the instructions. At first I thought the wrong door had been included. Eventually figured out that there was a second set of locating pin holes, duh.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: PetMate crates are my go to crate!
customer_reviews.text: I love PetMate crates, they have all the features that I love for my cats. They're built sturdy unlike some other brands of crates. I had another brand of crate come apart when taking a cat into the vet to be neutered and the cat escaped, never to be found again. With other crates we've also had cats push up on the tops and the door falls out and the cat escapes. The bad crate had snap clips holding it together, rather than nuts and bolts like PetMate has. PetMate is my go to crate, the only one that I'll buy. I feel much safer using PetMate when traveling or going to the vet office.
customer_reviews.author: bjm524

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier for short hauls
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a carrier to transport a cat or small dog in a car, this is perfect. It is not a permanent home or a place to leave the animal unattended. There are wire cages much better suited for leaving animals kenneled by themselves. This should be considered a short-haul carrier. It is plastic, so unruly animals will hurt themselves and damage this carrier. It serves it's intended purpose for what I bought it for. Those that didn't get all the bolts and nuts needed, I thank you. The spares I received are appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: SavingsShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Only one quibble
customer_reviews.text: Very good, sturdy carriers, even for cats who fight to get out. Very little slack on the doors, so the cat can't bust through it. Our one complaint is that the insides of the side holes are VERY sharp, and we've seen photos of cats who got injured trying to fight out of the carriers. My husband took our Dremel to the insides and sanded down the edges, so now they're safe. For the price, it's well worth it, but I wish the manufacturer would make the inside edges as blunt as the outside ones. It's a minor fix for a carrier that will last decades.
customer_reviews.author: Smizic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but poor quality control. Front door was almost impossible to squeeze handle to properly seat for either opening or closing. We contacted manufacturer but they said just to return it to Amazon, which required disassembly to fit it back into its original shipping box after lengthy chat procedure. Good idea with top opening feature but front door (on this particular unit, anyway) makes it pretty useless, especially for the priice.
customer_reviews.author: Danade

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier, No Sharp Edges
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pet carrier a little hesitantly because of the reviews about injured animals but after buying my second one, I can say that it's a great carrier. Before assembly, I ran my fingers along the slits to make sure they were smooth and they were just fine. It's a good, sturdy carrier that currently houses the week old kitten I'm looking after. If it's good enough for this little crawler, I'm sure it's going to be fine for you pets. Just check it before assembly but I'd do that anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crate, especially for the money. Sturdy and safe. Love the top opening feature. I prefer the type of fasteners to assemble that are a one piece deal without a screw, especially for easy cleaning. That’s why I gave it 4 and not 5 stars. Also, the color is okay. Would have liked a grey or other neutral option.
customer_reviews.author: CatnipAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for Percy the Cat
customer_reviews.text: My son has at home sessions, and like all toddler kids they love to leave the door open, causing Percy the cat to go out. We didn’t have an issue with him going out until one of the neighbors cat’s started fighting with him. This has come in handy during my son’s at home sessions, Percy has even warmed up to it, it’s spacious enough for him and his toys. I bought this used like new and it really was like new. I know this will come in handy for vet visits. It’s really sturdy and well made, it’s not flimsy or cheap. Definitely a great purchase that I’m sure will last.
customer_reviews.author: sszzz

customer_reviews.title: The pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: It works better for a bed for my cat. He likes to go in it. It was easy to assemble and is sturdy. But my complaint is that it's very hard for me to carry it with my cat in it. He's 14 pounds. The problem is the part of the carrier where the top is attached to the bottom. There is a ridge there and when I try to carry it, it hits the side of my knee and causes bruises. I had tried a soft side carrier but my cat was afraid in it. He's not so nervous in this one. But I can't find a way to carry it without getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Top door makes it easier to load an animal for transportation
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats, and got tired of trying to shove them through the door of the carrier for a vet visit. Figured a top loader would be easier. It is, but I have two complaints. The door on top doesn’t stay open by itself very well, and you might have to use one hand to manually hold it open which only leaves one hand to get your cat in. Also, the carrying handle on top is thin and so for me was not comfortable to carry. Something rounder and thicker would be a lot more comfortable. The carrier is quite large and sturdy, and my 13 lb cat had loads of room.
customer_reviews.author: Paula May

customer_reviews.title: No sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a better experience with this carrier than some of the other reviewers. I decided to buy this for my two Ragdolls because they’re larger than the average cat and I liked that I could play with them through the openings. I have two of these carriers now and they’ve never had sharp edges or issues with the doors. I buy the blue ones, so maybe there’s a manufacturing problem with the others. Either way, my cats love these and there’s plenty of room to put a cat cave/blanket and some toys for their vet visits. It also fits in my car seat and can be buckled in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Top user

customer_reviews.title: The last one I purchased was the size small and it works great and seems well better made than this one
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that came with it show it goes together with latches which it does not and the screws and nuts that hold it together do not screw together correctly only a few do - feeling very frustrated!!! The last one I purchased was the size small and it works great and seems well better made than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Date wrong and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: First of all it was delivered today 12-4 not yesterday 12-3 as indicated on the order page. Second the bolts were missing. which is why I gave it 4 stars. I notified the manufacturer today 12-4-19. 12-13 received the screws/bolts to secure the top portion to the bottom portion. One of the screws was melted but luckily they sent extras. Not enough to replace all of the bolts but a few extras. Carrier looks like it will do the job but have to train the cat to not be afraid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Top loading is far easier to use than standard kennels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great top loading carrier. I can't quite rate the security features with a 5th Star because one I happened to notice one of the pins on the top wasn't quite set in the hole, just before I picked it up. But once I set it properly, it was perfectly secure. Top loading my cats is far easier and less stressful for everyone obvious than trying to jam an unwilling cat horizontally through the front side hole. The top handle is sturdy enough to securely carry my 16 pound cat 🐈
customer_reviews.author: cmadtex

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my chihuahua. The good: size, color scheme, easy to assemble and they give you extra screws:) and that it has air vents and I like the top door feature... my only concern is that the front metal door when left open (which I do to encourage puppy to have positive association with crate training)..is that the two prongs that lock/unlock on the top and bottom of the door pose a threat. (They are sharp, & if your furry friend is a jumper this could be a problem). Overall, I am pleased and my fur friend seems to be happy~ cheers !
customer_reviews.author: Bella206

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Large Cat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect carrier for my large cat. She is very smart and extremely aware of when it's time to go to the Vet. It would be impossible to get her into a front load only carrier. The top load feature on this is perfect. It worked perfectly and she had a much less traumatic trip to the veterinarian.
customer_reviews.author: Craig T Parker

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of the blue topped carriers, one for each cat. They are light but very sturdy, easy to carry, easy to assemble (with extra bolts) and the cats love them! They even sleep in them if they're in the house. The trips to the vet are now non-traumatic. Also, the 22" long dog bed/cat bed with comfortable bolster fits this carrier perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Missing assembly hardware, warehouse deals didn’t catch it
customer_reviews.text: The 19” carrier had no screws or bolts to assemble! I bought two, one white and one red, from amazon warehouse deals. Neither carrier had been assembled or completely unpackaged so I’m assuming they are coming from the manufacturer without the necessary parts. I have no time to order replacements so I’ve assembled with zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Slight

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - door doesn't shut properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a two-door carrier to take my rabbit to the vet. I put it together without issue. However, the front door does not shut properly - you need to give it a really good shove. The worrying part is that it SEEMS shut so you'd have to remember every time to use force (and let anyone else know, like a vet tech taking your pet to another room.) It's an accident waiting to happen so I cannot risk keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Useful carrier
customer_reviews.text: The design with a top door is superior to the old front close. However, it would be ideal if you could prop the doors open or remove them at times. The kittens like to sleep in the carrier and I’d like to encourage that but the door constantly swings closed. No way to remove it or prop it open.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t use this carrier until you make it safer. As other reviewers reported, the carrier has sharp plastic protrusions that can seriously injure them. Forewarned, I checked and found four of these. I used four layers of duct tape over each of them, so I think I’ve solved the problem. I would have chosen another carrier instead, but I could find none that was safe. What’s going on with that? Manufacturers, is this really your best work? You should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: This is the third carrier we've purchased; the last two were taken by our kids. They are great carriers, especially when you have to evacuate for wildfires. This one was delivered very quickly in a large box w/o packaging, but was missing the screws and bolts to put it together - also looks like it was a returned item - so many stickers that don't remove easily. It looks smaller than the other two - so, I think we were delivered the smaller size. I will be returning it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RLF

customer_reviews.title: Not airline compliant as they claim to be.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 carriers, one for each cat only to arrive at the check in at Dekta and find out the carriers are not airline compliant. Huge disappointment, had to buy 2 carriers from Delta.....huge rip off, btw.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but did not come with handle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching everywhere for a decent looking cattier that can hold my 17 lb cat. Found this one and it had great reviews. It’s perfect size and very easy to put together. You don’t need to even read the instructions, and I am not handy at all. Feels very sturdy, the only complain I have is that it did not come with the handle. I reached out to the company via email and they were kind enough to send me a replacement handle free of charge :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: 24" is plenty large and secure for two kittens
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two kitten brothers. It will surely be large enough for the both of them for at least a year before they can no longer fit in this together. Easy to assemble. Straight forward doors. The side vent holes are not sharp edged like one reviewer claims. If your animal is stressed and frantic, they're going to hurt themselves on what ever is constricting them. Please take the time to condition your animals to not fear the carrier if you can. It's really not difficult for most of them, especially when they're very young. Be patient. The 22-inch MidWest Deluxe Bolster Pet Bed fits the 24-inch Petmate Two Door Top Load Dog Kennel perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: Fat cat and kitten approved
customer_reviews.text: 1# carrier of every rescue here in the desert! Top loaders are a must! I mean have you ever tried to shove a overweight upset cat into a carrier? Ya. Not fun! Top loaders are a game changer! Trust me it's worth it! My 23 lb cat fits easily
customer_reviews.author: Tina miller

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Two Door Top Load - Pet Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for pet carrier to transport my daughter's to and from the vet. I had used others before and they were not as sturdy and were not a good fit for the cat. In addition, the cost for the sizes that were comfortable for the cat were way too expensive. This was a good deal and provide the comfort and security for the cat. The top loading feature made it easy to place and remove the cat from the carrier. would highly recommend this carrier for pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing front door
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if it came with the front door. I emailed Petmate as instructed and haven’t gotten a response x4 days. Needed one quick so I ordered amazon basics one and it’s fine. Will return this one obviously. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: SophiaL

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cat Access; Challenging Human Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I got this "small" kennel for my large cat. It's considered small for dogs, I suppose, but it's just big enough for my fluffy 12-pound cat. He loves the top door as do the vet techs. Gone are the days of trying to pull him out of that front door. I didn't find any of the sharp edges noted by other reviewers. But this is not a 5-star product because assembly is a hassle. The plastic wing nuts don't always screw onto the bolts easily. It's like the plastic interior of some of the nuts isn't properly shaped. Be prepared to swear as you put it together. But after you're done, getting the cat in and out is easy!
customer_reviews.author: Leo D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats so I purchased two of these, and they were easy to assemble. I checked for sharp edges before putting my cats in and luckily everything was smooth. I got the medium size as my cats are about average in size, but my husband is also in the service so I got these in the event we have to move. The middle size has enough room in there for the cats as well as a small water/food dish or portable cat box, and for the cats to move around in while locked up. I would recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia S

customer_reviews.title: Could be more robust - but overall happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The size is great but it can be more robust. The hooks holding the handle on the top could be thicker/ wider. I feel like a sudden shock or over time the hooks will break. The bars holding the top gate couple be thicker too, along with the section of plastic holding the gate from opening. It's perfect for our cat, 10lbs. But the two features at top would worry me with heavier pets. Many have commented that their 20lb pets have been fine. I'd just worry with any sudden shocks that those components can break. Other than that the features are great, assembly was very easy plus extra parts in case you lose them over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great for LONG Cat, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Two different ways to put pet in. Also, the two different ways allows easier access to clean out. Light weight, great design and most of all our 19 year old very long kitty, Lacy loves it. It's her safe place when Company comes calling. It also serves as a good jail cell when old kitty wants everyone up at 3am to sit on the couch. Instructions; Simply place loud sassy kitty in jail (on her favorite fleece, of course). Shut the door, and place another fleece blanket on top. Guaranteed more peace and quiet until the alarm clock goes off😍
customer_reviews.author: Christmas Tree Man

customer_reviews.title: I love the carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love the carrier, but I think I received the wrong hardware pack with the carrier. The two main pieces are fastened together at the lip with bolts & nuts. There are 9 holes and I received 5 bolts and 7 nuts. The nuts are closed on the end and the bolts are too long to fasten securely. :( I have to go to the hardware store before I can use the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: no bolts or clips included
customer_reviews.text: There were no bolts/clips in the box or taped to the crate. Tried to get in touch with someone to get bolt/clips, no way to get in touch. I don't need to return the entire crate, I'd just like the bag of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorboy34

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, easy to assemble, less contricting for cats
customer_reviews.text: A really nice cat carrier with great quality. My cat, who is reluctant to go into any cat boxes, actually likes to sleep in it (as I have it on the floor in the dining room). I like how it is very easy to assemble and has a nice sturdy quality to it. The opening at the top is also a nice feature. The design of the carrier seems to make it less claustrophobic for the cats. Great quality overall. I will buy more if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: fra7299

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: The door is a little hard to open and close completely. It always takes at least two pushes to get in the holes. But it still closes and does its job! Other than that it was very easy to assemble. The top of the cage opens and closes very smoothly. The size is perfect for my holland lop bunny. I feel like the carrier is made from good material and will last for a while. I definitely Recommend this the people looking for a smallish carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Fits our angry, feral kitten
customer_reviews.text: My wife found a kitten in a garbage can at work and we're trying to work with her and tame her a little. All of our cat carriers are soft sided so we picked this one up. It's a top loader so that makes getting and angry and clawing kitten into the carrier. We can then open the front and let her come out in her own time after a vet visit. There were a lot of extra nuts and one extra bolt. The holes were a little tight and one was not formed correctly, but that didn't hurt the functionality. If we need another hard side cat carrier in the future, we'd get another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer Attaway

customer_reviews.title: Tall Enough For My Cat To Sit Up In And Top Loading Is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got a new cat and needed something to pick him up in. I wanted something tall enough that he could sit up in. I looked at pet stores and there’s were twice the price for smaller cases. I’ve had a cat in the past and they hate being put in the front door. The top loading feature was the number one reason I got this. Number two was the size. You won’t find a better carrier on the market for a better price than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Peck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The top load feature made this so easy to use. Historically, I was the like the Youtube videos of trying to stuff my cats (one 14.5 pounds) through a front door - one year it actually took both my son and I together in order to get the cat in the there. With this product, I just eased him down into the crate and then shut the door. I was relieved, he was relaxed - easy peasy. Thank you very much to the designer of this product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ambrosi

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier; Mistake with Screws
customer_reviews.text: This is a great top-loading crate and a good size but the screws they sent me were too long and there were only 5.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier for difficult cats
customer_reviews.text: I love my cat with my entire heart, but when it comes to getting her into a carrier, she is an absolute demon. I recently purchased this before moving to a new apartment and anticipated my usual 30-45 minutes of tears, blood and cursing, but the size of this carrier made it easy for me to get her in in less than five minutes. It's also super sturdy and easy to put together - just overall great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Top loading carriers are the best
customer_reviews.text: Over a eight month's period, we bought three different carriers trying to capture our last feral kitten so he could be spayed. Two of the carriers were front loading and we could never quite close the door before he burst out. One carrier had openings on three sides plus the top but they zipped closed which was never going to work. We needed a top loading carrier with a large opening and this one worked perfectly because before he realized what was happening, our Murphy and the towel he was wrapped in were placed through the top and I quickly closed the top. He's safely home none the worse for wear. Very grateful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Cat security & convenience
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one of these I have - the other 2 are from another company & I am not so pleased with. This carrier is easy to leave the top open for quick placement of the cat inside & then easy to close & secure. Yet yet when you arrive home, it is delightful to just open the door & they walk out. Having experienced this carrier, I would not purchase any other - ease of top opening/closing is a MUST.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. I have a large 14 pound cat who would throw fits inside his old soft sided carrier so I was looking for a hardsided, sturdy carrier to try out. I really like that this comes with two doors - the top load has made it way less stressful for him to go in and he also has ample space to really stretch out and get comfortable. I recommend this carrier to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: No assembly hardware for this item. The screws and bolts were missing. When you pay $39 for a pet carrier you expect all the pieces to be there. Luckily I had some old screws that I used to assemble this item. Make sure you inventory the pieces when you receive this item. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these which we purchased at the local big-box pet store. We were preparing to move and needed another one. The first one had been assembled at the store so we weren't sure how difficult this was going to be. Easy peasy! 2 minutes and it was done. One of our cats likes to go hang out in it. We think that's strange because she fights when it's actually time to get into hers which is smaller. There may be another purchase on the horizon!
customer_reviews.author: LovesLife

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and secure
customer_reviews.text: OK, we love this carrier. We have a shitzu puppy and it's perfect for her to grow in to. The top is secure with the squeeze motion lock and doesn't come undone when picked up by the top handle. It was simple to put together, simply screwing together. Came with a bunch of extra screws as well, we're assuming if any will get lost while owning it, but they haven't loosened and it's great carrier to travel with, very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to transport my pet rats to the veterinarian. The option of using the top door works great for them. I can put the carrier by their cage and open the top...they climb right in it. If I have to get one and put him in, the top load feature is easier than the regular door. I got one larger than what I really need in case we travel so they will have plenty of room. I can easily attach a water bottle to the front door as well. FAR better than some of the so-called "small animal" carriers that are marketed and in my opinion, far safer and much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: LAWNC

customer_reviews.title: This is Beautifully made.
customer_reviews.text: This is Beautifully made...sturdy and simple to assemble. My girl Violet is 12 lbs. And little sis Pepper,under 2lbs. They both love it!and buy the pad for inside...comfortable and cosy plush feel! It Fit perfect in the carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Dianelaine

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and sturdy crate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this carrier just to prepare in case we need to do wildfire evac. Thankfully no need to do so. But have used similar thing for our previous cats and this.one is exactly the same. Having two doors, one at the top and.one on the other end allows two easy options to allow easy access for a cat. At times I use now the crate as temporary time out area for the cats if they disturb me while I am cooking 😁
customer_reviews.author: arev

customer_reviews.title: Great pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting the carrier together. Seems sturdy, and as you can see, my not so small 15lb cat Oliver was in it before I finished tightening the screws. I purchased the 22" midwest bolster bed and it fits perfectly inside the carrier. I like that this carrier has a top opening, I don't need it for my cats, as they go in the carrier on their own, but it makes the carrier feel more open, and I can see them from the top, which I like. Overall I am very happy with this carrier and the price. I am going to purchase a 2nd for my other cat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rhinier

customer_reviews.title: I bought for my third cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on having another Petmate carrier that I like a lot. It went together easily and included extra bolts and nuts. It was actually more roomy than I expected. My 12-pound cat fit in there with room to spare. This item would probably be large enough for a very small dog breed. The top opening locks securly and is made of sturdy material. I can see this carrier lasting the life of my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: OhioJennie

customer_reviews.title: Good for big cats!
customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect if you have large cats. My cats are 17-18 pound tall breed boys, and they fit in this carrier great. I personally have not tested carrying them in it with JUST the handle because I'm too paranoid it will break (though it does feel sturdy enough to not break), but carrying them from the underside in this is easy and comfortable. I bought the recommended insert pad/pillow for this size and the cats like it. A+
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: this is a safe well built pet carrier priced right
customer_reviews.text: had one already love it can carry 2 small cats or one large cat comfortably with the top load and front load the cats can see you and feel more calmer .built very sturdy .easy to clean my cats love it driving with it secured i can open the top to give a rub or pet the cats .and they cant get loose and in case you have trouble with a front door only this makes it easier to put the pet inside .i only wish they would make a larger one .seems a logical move for the company 26 in long 2 inches taller 1-2 inches wider ..for 2 large cats ...
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is perfectly functional. It arrived with more than enough screws and the top door seems to be relatively sturdy. The floor also has a raised section, so if your pet pees in the carrier, it won't be sitting in urine the whole trip. I knocked it down some stars because it arrived filthy (covered with what looked to be ash) and one of the holes for the screws was partially blocked by plastic, I had to carve out the proper shape with a knife. The plastic also seems to be a bit thin and flimsy for my liking. I also do not like the nuts are made of plastic. Overall, the carrier is fine, if a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed, no sharp edges anywhere, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Petmate has read your comments and made many corrections to these kennels. Not a sharp edge anywhere inside or out to harm your pet. Very well constructed and easy to assemble. The doors were very easy to install and function perfectly. Nicely packaged and fast shipping. I'm so glad we chose these kennels (bought 2!) Now we just have to wait til our puppies are old enough to bring home. We're very excited!
customer_reviews.author: luvmovies

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and safe transport with no fight getting in
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my cat. He likes it so much that I leave it out and sometimes I find him in there playing with his toys. We use it quite often transporting him and it is great to put him in from the top. No fighting him to go in. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This crate is pretty well made. Putting it together takes a bit of doing. My cat is 11lbs and just over a year old. There was enough room to add 2 small bowls for water and food and he still had wiggle room while laying down or standing. The only thing I wish were bigger are the airholes on the sides and the opening top loader when closed. If you can't get to the front gate opening while traveling, you won't be able to put your fingers in to pet your furry. Other than that, its working out great and feel it will hold up for quite sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: and 7 pound chihuahua's and all three fit inside and they tell me EVERY day how much they love this. I can almost see on their f
customer_reviews.text: THIS cage deserves 10 stars. We have 5, 6, and 7 pound chihuahua's and all three fit inside and they tell me EVERY day how much they love this. I can almost see on their faces "WHY DIDN'T YOU BUY THIS 8 years ago?" Boy, don't I wish!!!!!!!!!!! Masterfully designed. All we have ever used before this was a soft sided case and one of the dogs figured out how to UNZIP from the inside. He was driving us crazy and finally broke the zipper. This was the replacement which came too many years later, but I am sure happy to have it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Tough to install nuts and bolts
customer_reviews.text: I like the carrier with two openings. The one on top works great. However the bolts that attach the two halves and the nuts that hat screw onto them are very difficult to install. I had to us pliers and at that they were still difficult. If the package hadn't been delivered at night I would have gone to Home Depot and bought different bolts with wingnuts. I might add that i am a motorcycle mechanic so i know what I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: bigals

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase; cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Same carrier as sold at local Pet Store for $20 less. Went from 19” to 24” and my cat loves it . I leave it with the door off when not in use and she naps in it and plays inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beware - you pay for shipping on returns
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this carrier for my cat but it is too small for any cat. It might work for a chihuahua. I would return it but it costs too much because the seller does not pay for return shipping. I should have read the small print but am so used to Amazon's policies that I was complacent. The local animal shelter will benefit from my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable size for my cat for traveling. Bigger than necessary for a vet visit, but still small enough for a 5'2" person to easily carry. I compared tons of carriers and this had the best overall reviews. The edges are not too sharp, as some reviews said. Get a soft bed for the inside to make cat for comfortable. Note that I haven't actually taken this out of the house yet due to coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it - so far
customer_reviews.text: The carrier was easy to put together. We ordered 2 and one had a broken corner (it was falling apart) in the top near the door. Amazon immediately replaced it! We had our new one before they received the return - now that's service! The carrier is quite attractive. We checked all the openings for rough edges as some reviews had mentioned that pets' noses/paws had been scratched/cut by rough edges. All were smooth. We haven't used them yet so it remains to be seen if our 20+ pound tuxedo boy can be comfortably carried (we know he fits because he tried it out as soon as we had it assembled!).
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned mine because a friend gave me an identical crate as a gift when I brought home my Shih tzu puppy. This crate looked so small to me initially, but it's actually a perfect size for a very small dog. My puppy is 5 lbs now and still has plenty of room to grow. My guess is that she'll outgrow this crate around the 10 lb point (fully grown for her).
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Safe weight load of carrier
customer_reviews.text: We bought this carrier for our 26 pound Maine Coon cat. I just got off the phone with customer service for Petmate. They tell me their specs for this 24" carrier indicate it is safe for any loads from 10 to 20 pounds. I'm tempted to try it for our cat because of the convenience of the top load feature and the fact that his 26 pounds don't seem to stress the carrier too greatly. Caveat Emptor I guess. I gave five stars because it clearly does what it is designed to do... and does it safely.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Small
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have a big cat but this carrier is too small. My poor kitty looks so uncomfortable in it and the upper door isn't really very wide. The front door, forget about it because she fights me tooth and nail. It's a real hassle getting her in there. I hate putting her in it and I think she hates it worse. Thankfully, we only use it for going to the vets. I guess I need to find a dog carrier instead!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: My vet compliments this carrier
customer_reviews.text: When I take my rabbits to the vet, they say "oh what a nice carrier!" They really appreciate the top door so they can more easily remove my bunnies. The space in here is great, and I think it's very important to give your pets space when taking them to a new unfamiliar place. I feel bad for cats shoved into tiny carriers that won't stop meowing in agony, while my bunnies over here have enough space to flop and relax. I can even fit their bed in here, which is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, crappy assembling issue....
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier... It was easy to assemble, however many of the holes weren't squared/ drilled or punched all the way through. I had to spend 45 minutes just getting those pinched through so the screw knobs would fit. If that hadn't have happened I would've given it 5 stars. I was bummed it took so long even with 2 day prime shipping I couldn't use it to take kitty to vet. Had I known I wouldnt have it on time and the assembling issue I would've just gone to the store and bought one.
customer_reviews.author: KrisT SmithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfert & fast delivery. Even on a Sunday!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item, because I have 2 cats. Mainly I purchased this 24" 1, because1 of my cats is 21lbs. So i need a larger carrier that I was not able to find at any of the store locally. This 1 seams like it going tobe perfect. It was easy to put together except for 1 hole. It didn't have a perfect square hold like the other ones, but I was able to cut the little piece off to make it square like the other ones. It not only was delivered quickly, but it was delivered on a Sunday. I was so surprised. It's also very nice & sturdy. I would definitely recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love these carriers! They are super nice and perfect for my cats. I had some difficulty screwing the wing nuts on, but leave that to my husband. I also love the top and front loading feature. I had previously ordered 2, and recently ordered the 3rd one. For some reason the 3rd one was missing the handle, so I called Petmate’s customer service. I talked to a wonderful young lady who said she would have a handle mailed out immediately! Amazing service!
customer_reviews.author: C. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lucky if it lasts 6 months
customer_reviews.text: When we first got the kennel, had some issues getting the top flip door mounted a few times as it would pop out of the track. As of today (about 6 months now), my Cairne Terrier was able to chew the plastic off under the upper door and get out. Site says no warranty. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: JWD

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and convenient top door opening
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is a little big for my cat, but it has a very secure vented top door that is critical if you are trying to take a cat to the veterinarian and she does not want to go! It is much easier to put a cat into a carrier from the top than trying to shove it through a front door. The carrier is put together using secure screws instead of cheap plastic fasteners. It was easy to assemble. Just remember to put the door in place before you start to put in the screws (i.e., follow the directions).
customer_reviews.author: cj

product_meta.title: Petmate Two Door Top Load
product_meta.description: Size:24"| Color:Pearl Ash Blue / Coffee GroundPetmate's Two Door Top Load kennel keeps pets comfortable and secure, giving pet parents peace of mind. The Petmate Two Door Top Load kennel features a unique top-loading door that allows pet parents to easily place and remove pets from the carrier with both hands. Sturdy enough for travel, both front and top-load doors are constructed with steel, and feature easy-squeeze latches for convenient access. For use as a pet travel carrier or dog kennel, pets will enjoy visibility on all sides of the kennel and the flow of fresh air. As a kennel for small dogs and puppies, the sturdy plastic walls and steel doors keep pets protected, and the spacious kennel bottom can accommodate a kennel pad for added cushion. The kennel measures 24 inches long for a range of small pets; pet parents can choose from four pearlescent color combinations: "Pearl Honey Rose/Coffee Grounds"; "Pearl White/Coffee Grounds"; "Metallic Pearl Ash Blue/Coffee Grounds"; "Metallic Pearl Tan/Coffee Grounds" Perfect tool for housetraining Product Note : 24" Interior Dimensions: 21" L x 14.5" W x 13.5" H
feature_bullets: PET CRATE FOR SMALL DOGS: This small dog kennel has a top entry door so you can access your cat or dog. Suitable for small dog breeds between 10-20 lbs. Measures: 19"

AIR TRAVEL APPROVED: This pet carrier meets most airline cargo specifications. The air travel kennel for dogs & cats also has a durable, ergonomic comfort-grip handle & ventilated sides for comfortable transport.
KENNELS & HOUSES: Crate & kennel training is vital for dog safety & comfort. We provide traditional travel carriers, wire training & exercise kennels, play pens, barn-style dog houses & more

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
